Class BaseComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeChangeNotificationSendingComponent, BaseExecutableComponent, ConnectionManager, FileSystemManager, LocalLoggerMonitor, LocalRemoteDataMatchChecker, LoggerLifecycleStateMachine, LoggerManager, LoggerReplicationStateMachine, LogsReplicationClient, LogsReplicationClientHandler, LogsReplicationServer, LogsReplicationServerHandler

    public abstract class BaseComponent
extends BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
    This is the base superclass of all components.
    Author:
    Guillaume Jacob (guillaume.jacob@orcsoftware.com)

        protected void postInitialize()
                       throws OperationException
        Description copied from class: BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
        Invoked at the end of the initialization phase. Can be implemented to automate the execution of certain operations on the component just after its initialization.

      • initializationFailed

        protected void initializationFailed()
        Description copied from class: BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
        Invoked at the end of the initialization phase if the initialization failed. Can be implemented to automate the execution of certain operations on the component just after an uncessful attempt to initialize it.
